specialisms.title: Receptionist
specialisms.info: Greets guests, manages reservations, check-in and check-out processes, and provides information about the hotel

specialisms.title: Front office manager
specialisms.info: Oversees the reception staff and manages the daily operations of the department

specialisms.title: Reservation agent
specialisms.info: Handles phone and online reservations and updates the reservation system

specialisms.title: Concierge
specialisms.info: Provides services such as activity suggestions, restaurant bookings, and transportation arrangements

specialisms.title: Housekeeper / Maid
specialisms.info: Cleans and tidies guest rooms and public areas

specialisms.title: Housekeeping Supervisor
specialisms.info: Inspects the cleanliness of rooms and coordinates the housekeeping staff

specialisms.title: Linen Room Attendant
specialisms.info: Manages linens, towels, and cleaning supplies

specialisms.title: Cook / Chef
specialisms.info: Prepares and cooks meals according to the hotel's menu

specialisms.title: Executive Chef
specialisms.info: Responsible for the kitchen, menu planning, and supervising the kitchen staff

specialisms.title: Sous chef
specialisms.info: The assistant to the Executive Chef, responsible for overseeing the kitchen and meal preparation

specialisms.title: Pastry Chef
specialisms.info: Specializes in creating desserts and pastries

specialisms.title: Waiter / Waitress
specialisms.info: Serves customers in the hotel's restaurant, takes orders, and serves food and beverages

specialisms.title: Maître d'hôtel
specialisms.info: Ensures the smooth operation of the restaurant, manages staff, and provides customer service

specialisms.title: Bartende
specialisms.info: Prepares and serves drinks at the hotel bar

specialisms.title: Sommelier
specialisms.info: A wine expert who suggests wine options to guests and manages the hotel's wine cellar

specialisms.title: General Manager
specialisms.info: Responsible for the overall operation of the hotel, including strategy and staff management

specialisms.title: Rooms Division Manager
specialisms.info: Manages room-related services, such as reception, housekeeping, and reservations

specialisms.title: Food and Beverage Manager
specialisms.info: Oversees the food and beverage department, including restaurants and bars

specialisms.title: Accountant
specialisms.info: Manages the hotel's finances, payments, and payroll

specialisms.title: Purchasing Manager
specialisms.info: Manages the hotel's supplies and inventory

specialisms.title: Maintenance Worker/Technician
specialisms.info: Handles maintenance and repairs in the hotel, such as electrical and plumbing work

specialisms.title: Maintenance Manager
specialisms.info: Coordinates maintenance tasks and supervises technical staff

specialisms.title: Security Manager
specialisms.info: Manages the security of the facilities and staff

specialisms.title: Entertainment Manager
specialisms.info: Organizes and oversees entertainment activities for guests

specialisms.title: Fitness Instructor
specialisms.info: Organizes and supervises fitness and wellness programs

specialisms.title: Spa Therapist
specialisms.info: Provides spa services such as massages, body treatments, and facials

specialisms.title: Bellboy
specialisms.info: Assists guests with their luggage and escorts them to their rooms

specialisms.title: Valet
specialisms.info: Manages the parking of guest vehicles

specialisms.title: Laundry Attendant
specialisms.info: Responsible for washing and caring for linens and guest clothing

specialisms.title: Manager
specialisms.info: In rental rooms, the owner often takes on management responsibilities, ensuring the smooth operation of the business and customer service

specialisms.title: Online Marketing Manager
specialisms.info: Manages the property's presence on booking platforms and social media, ensuring that customers can easily find and book

specialisms.title: Guest Relations Manager
specialisms.info: Ensures an excellent guest experience, manages reviews, and promptly resolves any issues

specialisms.title: Gardener
specialisms.info: Responsible for the care and maintenance of the hotel's gardens, green spaces, and outdoor areas

specialisms.title: Cook/Chef
specialisms.info: Prepares and cooks dishes according to the establishment's menu

specialisms.title: Executive Chef
specialisms.info: Responsible for the overall operation of the kitchen, menu planning, and supervising the kitchen staff

specialisms.title: Sous Chef
specialisms.info: Assists the Executive Chef, oversees the kitchen in their absence, and is responsible for preparing specific dishes

specialisms.title: Commis Chef/Assistant Cook
specialisms.info: Assists in ingredient preparation and the cooking process under the supervision of chefs

specialisms.title: Pastry Chef
specialisms.info: Specializes in preparing desserts, pastries, and other baked goods

specialisms.title: Baker
specialisms.info: Prepares bread, pastries, and other baked items for the establishment

specialisms.title: Chef de Partie
specialisms.info: Head of a specific line in the kitchen, responsible for a particular section, such as appetizers, grills, or hot dishes

specialisms.title: Waiter/Waitress
specialisms.info: Serves customers, takes orders, delivers food and drinks, and ensures a pleasant dining experience

specialisms.title: Maître d'hôtel/Floor Manager
specialisms.info: Oversees the overall management of the dining area, table assignments, and ensures smooth customer service

specialisms.title: Expediter/Runner
specialisms.info: Acts as an intermediary between the kitchen and dining area, ensuring that dishes are served correctly and on time

specialisms.title: Barista
specialisms.info: Specializes in preparing coffee and other hot or cold beverages

specialisms.title: Host/Hostess
specialisms.info: Welcomes guests, guides them to their tables, and manages reservations

specialisms.title: Sommelier
specialisms.info: Wine expert who recommends wine options to customers and manages the restaurant's wine inventory

specialisms.title: Bartender
specialisms.info: Prepares and serves drinks and cocktails to customers, often creating new cocktail recipes

specialisms.title: Barback
specialisms.info: Assists the bartender by managing bar supplies, restocking, and maintaining a clean bar area

specialisms.title: Restaurant Manager
specialisms.info: Responsible for the overall operation of the establishment, managing staff, ensuring compliance with regulations, and customer service

specialisms.title: Food and Beverage Manager
specialisms.info: Manages food and beverage departments, including menu planning, supplies, and customer relations

specialisms.title: Purchasing Manager
specialisms.info: In charge of procuring the materials and products required for the efficient operation of the establishment

specialisms.title: Dishwasher/Kitchen Porter
specialisms.info: Cleans dishes, utensils, and kitchen equipment, maintaining a clean and organized kitchen

specialisms.title: Busser
specialisms.info: Assists waitstaff by clearing dishes, setting tables, and keeping the dining area clean

specialisms.title: Janitor/Cleaner
specialisms.info: Keeps the interior and exterior of the establishment clean, ensuring the cleanliness of all areas

specialisms.title: Accountant
specialisms.info: Manages the establishment's finances, payroll, and payments

specialisms.title: Reservations Agent
specialisms.info: Handles phone and online reservations for the restaurant

specialisms.title: Kitchen Assistant
specialisms.info: Helps with ingredient preparation, such as chopping vegetables and preparing salads

specialisms.title: Personal Chef
specialisms.info: Works exclusively for private clients, usually in homes, responsible for meal planning and preparation according to the client's needs

specialisms.title: Entertainment Manager
specialisms.info: Responsible for the overall management of entertainment and leisure activities, organizing events, and coordinating staff

specialisms.title: Recreation Manager
specialisms.info: Manages sports and recreational facilities, such as swimming pools, gyms, and playgrounds

specialisms.title: Event Manager
specialisms.info: Organizes and supervises the execution of events, from preparation to completion

specialisms.title: Program Coordinator
specialisms.info: Designs and coordinates the schedule of activities and events, ensuring that the activities meet the needs of the clients

specialisms.title: Sound Technician
specialisms.info: Manages the sound installation and equipment during performances, concerts, and other events

specialisms.title: Lighting Technician
specialisms.info: Responsible for the design and operation of lighting during events

specialisms.title: Director
specialisms.info: Guides artists and actors in the creation of theatrical or other performances

specialisms.title: Stage Manager
specialisms.info: Coordinates onstage activities and ensures the smooth flow of the performance

specialisms.title: Costume Designer
specialisms.info: Creates and supervises costumes for performances, theatrical works, or other events

specialisms.title: Set Designer
specialisms.info: Responsible for creating and constructing sets for theatrical productions or events

specialisms.title: Front Desk Attendant
specialisms.info: Welcomes visitors and provides information about the venue's activities and services

specialisms.title: Cashier
specialisms.info: Manages payments and bookings for tickets, activities, or services

specialisms.title: Guest Relations Officer
specialisms.info: Handles customer issues and provides specialized customer service

specialisms.title: Janitor/Cleaner
specialisms.info: Maintains the cleanliness of facilities, such as halls, recreation areas, and restrooms

specialisms.title: Performer/Entertainer
specialisms.info: Participates in shows, musical concerts, dance shows, or other events

specialisms.title: Actor
specialisms.info: Performs in theatrical plays, film productions, or television programs

specialisms.title: Dancer
specialisms.info: Performs dance shows in various entertainment and leisure venues

specialisms.title: Musician
specialisms.info: Plays live music, participating in concerts, shows, or other events

specialisms.title: DJ (Disc Jockey)
specialisms.info: Plays music in nightclubs, events, or private parties, creating the appropriate atmosphere for attendees

specialisms.title: Fitness Instructor
specialisms.info: Organizes and supervises fitness programs, aerobics, or other sports activities

specialisms.title: Coach
specialisms.info: Trains and guides teams or athletes in various sports, whether at a professional or amateur level

specialisms.title: Lifeguard
specialisms.info: Oversees swimmers in pools or beaches and intervenes in case of emergency

specialisms.title: Activity Coordinator
specialisms.info: Organizes and supervises recreational activities for children and adults, such as games, excursions, and other fun activities

specialisms.title: Ticket Seller
specialisms.info: Manages ticket sales for events, activities, or venue admissions

specialisms.title: Gift Shop Attendant
specialisms.info: Manages sales in souvenir or gift shops within the recreation venue

specialisms.title: Tour Guide
specialisms.info: Provides information and tours to visitors in theme parks, museums, or other leisure venues

specialisms.title: Jeweler
specialisms.info: Designs and sells jewelry and accessories in special shops or events

specialisms.title: Photographer
specialisms.info: Captures moments from events, theme parks, or other activities and offers photos to visitors

specialisms.title: Taxi Driver
specialisms.info: Responsible for transporting passengers within cities or specific areas using taxis or private vehicles

specialisms.title: City Bus Driver
specialisms.info: Operates buses on predetermined routes within the city, serving the public

specialisms.title: Intercity Bus Driver
specialisms.info: Transports passengers between cities or even countries, covering long distances

specialisms.title: School Bus Driver
specialisms.info: Transports students to and from school, ensuring their safety

specialisms.title: Chauffeur/Limousine Driver
specialisms.info: Provides high-end transport services for individuals or companies with luxury vehicles

specialisms.title: Tour Bus Driver
specialisms.info: Transports tourists to destinations and attractions, usually in collaboration with travel agencies

specialisms.title: Truck Driver
specialisms.info: Transports goods and cargo within cities or between regions, covering medium and long distances

specialisms.title: Tanker Driver
specialisms.info: Carries liquid or gaseous cargo, such as fuel or chemicals, in specialized vehicles

specialisms.title: Refrigerated Truck Driver
specialisms.info: Transports perishable goods in vehicles that maintain a specific temperature to ensure quality

specialisms.title: Container Truck Driver
specialisms.info: Transports goods in containers to and from ports, warehouses, and other distribution centers

specialisms.title: Delivery Driver
specialisms.info: Delivers products and goods to customers or businesses locally, often using smaller vehicles

specialisms.title: Ambulance Driver
specialisms.info: Drives ambulances, ensuring the rapid and safe transport of patients to medical facilities

specialisms.title: Fire Truck Driver
specialisms.info: Operates fire trucks during emergency situations like fires

specialisms.title: Rescue Vehicle Driver
specialisms.info: Drives vehicles used in rescue operations or emergency situations

specialisms.title: Snowplow Driver
specialisms.info: Clears snow and ice from roads and public areas using specialized vehicles

specialisms.title: Crane Truck Driver
specialisms.info: Operates cranes for moving heavy objects or for construction work

specialisms.title: Road Roller Driver
specialisms.info: Operates road rollers for the construction and maintenance of road surfaces

specialisms.title: Excavator Operator
specialisms.info: Operates excavators for construction projects, digging, and other heavy tasks

specialisms.title: Tractor Driver
specialisms.info: Operates agricultural machinery for land cultivation and other farming tasks

specialisms.title: Garbage Truck Driver
specialisms.info: Collects and transports waste and recyclables to processing facilities

specialisms.title: Dispatch Coordinator
specialisms.info: Organizes and manages the routes of vehicles and drivers, ensuring efficient transport operations

specialisms.title: Transport Inspector
specialisms.info: Checks compliance with safety regulations on roads and vehicles

specialisms.title: Driving Instructor
specialisms.info: Trains new drivers to obtain driving licenses for private or commercial vehicles

specialisms.title: Automotive Mechanic
specialisms.info: Repairs and maintains vehicles, ensuring their proper operation

specialisms.title: Tire Technician
specialisms.info: Specializes in installing and repairing tires on vehicles

specialisms.title: Car Wash Attendant
specialisms.info: Maintains the cleanliness of vehicles, both externally and internally

specialisms.title: Captain
specialisms.info: Head of a large ship, responsible for overall command, navigation, safety of the ship, and crew

specialisms.title: Chief Officer/First Mate
specialisms.info: Assists the captain on larger ships, responsible for cargo safety and crew management

specialisms.title: Second Officer
specialisms.info: Assists in navigation and bridge management on large ships

specialisms.title: Third Officer
specialisms.info: Oversees specific safety duties and bridge operations on large ships

specialisms.title: Chief Engineer
specialisms.info: Responsible for the mechanical operation of large ships

specialisms.title: Second Engineer
specialisms.info: Assists the Chief Engineer on larger ships

specialisms.title: Third Engineer
specialisms.info: Handles maintenance and operation of the engine room on large ships

specialisms.title: Oiler/Motorman
specialisms.info: Maintains and operates engines on ship and vessels

specialisms.title: Small Vessel Engineer
specialisms.info: Responsible for the maintenance and repair of engines on smaller vessels, such as yachts and sailboats

specialisms.title: Able Seaman/Deckhand
specialisms.info: Performs daily tasks on deck, assists in maintenance, and ensures safe navigation of the vessel

specialisms.title: Boatswain/Bosun
specialisms.info: Head of deckhands, mainly on larger ships, responsible for deck maintenance

specialisms.title: Radio Operator
specialisms.info: Manages communications, primarily on larger ships

specialisms.title: Safety Officer
specialisms.info: Oversees safety measures and crew training, primarily on larger ships

specialisms.title: Pilot
specialisms.info: Guides the ship through narrow waters, such as harbors, to ensure safe navigation

specialisms.title: Purser
specialisms.info: Responsible for managing finances and passenger services on larger ships

specialisms.title: Receptionist
specialisms.info: Greets passengers and manages reservations, mainly on passenger ships

specialisms.title: Steward/Stewardess
specialisms.info: Ensures cleanliness and passenger service on passenger ships and recreational boats

specialisms.title: Chef
specialisms.info: Responsible for the kitchen on ships and larger recreational vessels

specialisms.title: Cook Assistant
specialisms.info: Assists in meal preparation

specialisms.title: Bartender
specialisms.info: Serves drinks to passengers on ships and recreational vessels

specialisms.title: Ship's Doctor
specialisms.info: Provides medical care to the crew and passengers on large ships

specialisms.title: Ship's Nurse
specialisms.info: Assists the doctor and provides first aid

specialisms.title: Cargo Officer
specialisms.info: Manages cargo loading and unloading

specialisms.title: Chartering Broker
specialisms.info: Negotiates the chartering of the ship

specialisms.title: Storekeeper
specialisms.info: Manages inventory and supplies

specialisms.title: Ship's Electrician
specialisms.info: Maintains electrical systems on ships

specialisms.title: Refrigeration Engineer
specialisms.info: Manages cooling systems on ships

specialisms.title: Ship Inspector
specialisms.info: Inspects the ship's seaworthiness

specialisms.title: Entertainment Manager
specialisms.info: Organizes and manages entertainment activities on recreational boats and yachts

specialisms.title: Skipper
specialisms.info: Responsible for navigating and operating smaller vessels, such as sailboats, yachts, fishing boats, or recreational boats (under 24 meters)

specialisms.title: Galley Steward/Assistant Cook
specialisms.info: Assists in meal preparation and cooking, helps maintain cleanliness in the kitchen, and is also responsible for the internal cleanliness of the vessel (under 24 meters)

specialisms.title: Boat Cook
specialisms.info: Provides meals on smaller recreational boats (under 24 meters)

specialisms.title: Deckhand
specialisms.info: Assists with the maintenance and operation of the deck on a boat or ship, including tasks such as cleaning, handling ropes, and supporting the crew in various activities (under 24 meters)

specialisms.title: Bowline Operator
specialisms.info: Handles and manages the ropes and lines used to secure a vessel to a dock or other mooring, ensuring that the boat is safely and securely fastened

specialisms.title: Event Director
specialisms.info: Responsible for the overall organization and execution of the festival or event, from initial concept to completion

specialisms.title: Production Manager
specialisms.info: Manages the event's production by coordinating technical teams, schedules, and budgets

specialisms.title: Operations Manager
specialisms.info: Oversees the daily operations of the event, ensuring everything runs smoothly during the event

specialisms.title: Program Coordinator
specialisms.info: Plans and coordinates the schedule of activities and performances during the event

specialisms.title: Logistics Coordinator
specialisms.info: Manages supplies, transportation, and installations, ensuring all necessary materials are available

specialisms.title: Security Manager
specialisms.info: Ensures the safety of participants, staff, and visitors during the event

specialisms.title: Sound Technician
specialisms.info: Sets up and manages sound for performances, speeches, and other event activities

specialisms.title: Lighting Technician
specialisms.info: Installs and operates lighting for stages and event areas

specialisms.title: Stage Technician
specialisms.info: Responsible for the construction, maintenance, and dismantling of stages and related installations

specialisms.title: Event Electrician
specialisms.info: Ensures all electrical installations function correctly and safely during the event

specialisms.title: Visual Technician
specialisms.info: Operates visual equipment, such as projectors and screens, for displaying videos or other visual content

specialisms.title: Front Desk Attendant
specialisms.info: Welcomes visitors and provides information about the event schedule and facilities

specialisms.title: Ticketing Agent
specialisms.info: Manages ticket sales and reservations for entry to the event

specialisms.title: Guest Relations Officer
specialisms.info: Handles visitor issues and provides specialized customer service

specialisms.title: Cleaner/Janitor
specialisms.info: Maintains the cleanliness of event spaces, including restrooms, halls, and common areas

specialisms.title: Performer
specialisms.info: Participates in performances, musical concerts, theatrical plays, or other forms of entertainment during the event

specialisms.title: Musician
specialisms.info: Performs live music at concerts or other festival activities

specialisms.title: DJ (Disc Jockey)
specialisms.info: Plays music at specific parts of the event, such as parties or main stages

specialisms.title: Host/MC
specialisms.info: Presents and guides the audience during performances or other activities

specialisms.title: Catering Manager
specialisms.info: Manages the provision of food and beverages to guests and staff during the event

specialisms.title: Chef
specialisms.info: Prepares meals offered during the event

specialisms.title: Bartender
specialisms.info: Prepares and serves drinks to event attendees

specialisms.title: Waiter/Waitress
specialisms.info: Serves guests food and beverages at various dining areas within the event

specialisms.title: Marketing Manager
specialisms.info: Designs and implements promotional strategies to attract visitors and promote the event

specialisms.title: Merchandise Seller
specialisms.info: Manages the sales of products or memorabilia associated with the event

specialisms.title: Sponsorship Coordinator
specialisms.info: Manages sponsorships and partnerships that financially support the event

specialisms.title: Social Media Manager
specialisms.info: Handles the event's promotion on social networks, creating and publishing content

specialisms.title: Volunteer
specialisms.info: Supports various event functions by assisting staff as needed

specialisms.title: First Aid Attendant
specialisms.info: Provides first aid to visitors or staff who may need it

specialisms.title: Security Guard
specialisms.info: Ensures order and safety at the event venue

specialisms.title: Tour Guide
specialisms.info: Provides information and tours to visitors during the event or as part of the festival

specialisms.title: Photographer
specialisms.info: Captures moments of the event, from performances to audience scenes

specialisms.title: Videographer
specialisms.info: Records videos for event coverage or promotional purposes
